AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.issues_are_not_addressed: Did not properly identify and address one or more issues before the Board
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.findings_are_not_supported: Findings are not supported by adequate reasons, bases
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.process_violations: Did not adequately address due process violations
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.remands_are_not_completed: Remands not complete, legally sufficient or require necessary development
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.grammar_errors: Major or frequent spelling, grammar, typographical, usage, formatting errors

POSITIVE_FEEDBACK.appropriate_use_of_law: Appropriate use of law, precedential opinion and administrative procedure
POSITIVE_FEEDBACK.well_proofed: Well proofed (no to minimal typos/grammar errors)
POSITIVE_FEEDBACK.well_annotated_file: Well-annotated file for VLJ review to include appropriate use of tags and comments
POSITIVE_FEEDBACK.concise_detailed_remand: Remand is concise and provides detailed, understandable directives
